price: প্ৰত্যেক জীৱৰ ওপৰতেই এজন তত্ত্বাৱধায়ক আছে।
arabic: إِن كُلُّ نَفۡسٖ لَّمَّا عَلَيۡهَا حَافِظٞ

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: in kullu nafsin lammā ʿalayhā ḥāfiẓun
